other_tests.findings: Serum valproic acid level was 86.1 µg/ml (normal range=50–125), free valproic acid was 15 µg/ml (normal range=5–10), and albumin level was 3.8 g/dl (normal range=3.2–5.2).
other_tests.changes_over_time: After reducing the dose of extended-release divalproex sodium to 1000 mg/day, his sensorium returned to normal in approximately 3 days.

other_tests.findings: Nonfunctioning islet cell carcinoma of the pancreas was discovered; psychiatric symptoms did not alleviate after the surgery.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Three months after the operation, a high level of serum parathyroid hormone was found, but psychiatric symptoms did not improve.

other_tests.findings: Microadenoma of the anterior pituitary gland and swelling of the parathyroid gland were observed.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The microadenoma was nonfunctioning and did not require treatment; parathyroid swelling necessitated surgical treatment.
